data.title: Converte, Domine, captivitatem nostram [Instrumentation]
data.meta_description: Converte, Domine, captivitatem nostram is a sacred air from Rameau motet In convertendo Dominus. See instruments, text, translation, key, meter and more.
data.text:
Hi! I’m Ben, and I’m a baritone singer. I created VMII to make early music more accessible. Now, over 250,000 people use the site each year, and our servers cost $150 a month. Please give a bit so that this can stay free for everyone! Thank you!

Give a bit so this site can stay free!

Hi! I’m Ben, and I’m a singer. I created VMII to make early music more accessible. Now, over 250,000 people use the site each year, and our servers cost $150 a month. I don’t make money from the site and just want to keep it a non-profit. Please give a bit so that this can stay free for everyone!

Thank you!

Ben Kazez, baritone

President/Founder

VMII Foundation, a 501(c)3 non-profit (EIN: 93-2666784)

ben@vmii.org

We are a 501(c)(3) nonprofit. Your donations are VMII are tax deductible for US income tax purposes.
